ModMetaData.name: Absolute Legends Hair
ModMetaData.author: RE6AL
ModMetaData.description:
Mullets, and other kinds of legendary styles. Homeless people, New Kids Turbo, Rednecks, and other fashion icons are here.
Recommended use with HAIR MODDING PLUS
I also have Pirated Hair pack (on Github) which contains hairs ripped from other mods, BECAUSE most of hair packs have stupid stuff which doesnt look good, so I chose only the good stuff that make characters look interesting. https://github.com/Re6aL List of mods you can disregard after installing my piracy mod is there to find.
After creating this hair pack i did cut my hair to mullet style. That was the best decicion i ever made in my entire life.
